Bernie 2020 with Alex Press and Bhaskar Sunkara 

26 Feb 2020

Live show with Jacobin’s Bhaskar Sunkara and Alex Press in Cambridge, MA for Bernie 2020. Recorded the night of Nevada caucuses.
